info.description: calls deletions and insertions. Deletions are also verified and consensus sequences of insertions are extracted.
info.paperDescription: svCaller was used to call deletions, insertions as well as consensus sequences of insertions and to verify the predicted deletions.

param.name: help
param.description: show this help message and exit

param.name: bed
param.description: Path to bedgraph file

param.name: min_cld
param.description: The mininum distance of two clusters, at which they still get combined

param.name: min_size
param.description: Minimum size of a deletion.

param.name: max_z
param.description: Maximum z score threshold for coverage analysis

param.name: max_direct
param.description: Maximum direct z score threshold for coverage analysis

param.name: max_local
param.description: Maximum local z score threshold for coverage analysis

param.name: range
param.description: Size of range/region before a certain position, used for the determination of local z Score parameters

param.name: pc
param.description: Pseudo count for coverages over positions

param.name: tol
param.description: Tolerance of insertion positions mapped to deletions

param.name: bam
param.description: Path to bam file used for clipping patter analysis

param.name: out_del
param.description: Path to output txt file containing deletions

param.name: out_ins
param.description: Path to output txt file containing insertions

param.name: max_patt_diff
param.description: Maximum distance of peaks of clipped reads to count them as insertion

param.name: min_sur_z
param.description: Minimum local z score for clipping pattern analysis

param.name: ws
param.description: Size of the window, whose position are controlled to be significantly low

param.name: min_z
param.description: Minimum z score for clipping pattern analysis

param.name: get_clp_file
param.description: Set this paramter as a path to get a file containing for each position the number of clipped reads

param.name: min_reads
param.description: Minimum number of reads at which a position is permitted to be a peak

param.name: gen_prop
param.description: Number of propagations to determine genome start/end

param.name: gap
param.description: Maximum number of permitted consecutive gaps/0-coverage positions during the determination of the genome start/end

param.name: ref
param.description: Path to reference genome

param.name: fir_ws
param.description: Primary threshold for the score, which is used for the verification of deletions with clipped sequences

param.name: sec_ws
param.description: Secondary, more stringent threshold for the score, which is used for the verification of deletions with clipped sequences

param.name: con_path
param.description: Path to the file containing the consensus sequences

param.name: mpc
param.description: Small pseudo count for the log used for the computation of the PWMs

param.name: min_length
param.description: The minimum length of a consensus sequence

param.name: clp_ver_range
param.description: The range of clipped positons of deletions, where consesus sequences are tried to match on
